A

Implementation of all runners advancing by the given number of bases.

Static method used for asking the user a yes or no question.

B

balls - Variable in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
The number of balls of this count.

C

callBall() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Implementation of a ball being called and the batter being walked if applicable.
callStrike() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Implementation of a strike being called and the batter being struckout if applicable.
checkStrikeout() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
Determines whether or not this count should result in a strikeout.
checkWalk() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
Determines whether or not this count should result in a walk.

Static method used for clearing the console.
Count - Class in wiffleballScorekeeper.game
The Count class is used to represent a count in wiffleball.
Count() - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
Initializes a blank count.
Count(Count) - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
This constructor is a copy constructor, which provides a way to create a copy of the given existing Count instance.

D

display() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Prints this games current state to the console, formatted to look like a scoreboard.
display() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.MainMenu
Overides the base Menu class' display method to include the title of this menu.
display() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.Menu
Displays the list of options to the screen for the user to see.
displayFinal() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Prints the final game state to the screen, formatted to look like a boxscore.

F

flyOut() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Implementation of an out being recorded via flyout.

G

Game - Class in wiffleballScorekeeper.game
This main Game class is a representation of a game of wiffleball.
Game(int, String, String) - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Initializes a newly started game against the provided team names, that will last the given number of innings.
Game(Game) - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
This constructor is a copy constructor, and provides a way to create a copy of the given existing Game instance.
GameMenus - Class in wiffleballScorekeeper.menu
This GameMenu class is a collection of Menu's used to control an instance of the Game class.
GameMenus(Game, WiffleballScorekeeper) - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.GameMenus
Creates an instance of the this GameMenu class that will be used to control the provided game based on the user's input.
getDisplayString() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
Produces a formatted string representing this count, that can then be printed to the screen.
getInt(String, int, int) - Static method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.Menu
Static mehtod used to get a validated integer between the minimum and maximum numbers.
getLastStackedState() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.WiffleballScorekeeper
Returns the last instance of a game state stored in the game state stack.
getRuns() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Team
Method used for accessing this team's total number of runs.
getRunserPerInning() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Team
Method used for accessing this team's number of runs per inning.
getString(String, int) - Static method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.Menu
Static method used to get a string no longer than the provided maximum number of characters.
groundOut() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Implementation of an out being recorded via groundout.

nextAction() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.Menu
Prompts for, gets and processes the next valid user input, using the overidden Menu.processInput(char) method in the child class.

P

playGame() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.GameMenus
Main loop used to get input from the user for this instance's Game.
processInput(char) - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.MainMenu
Implements the abstract MainMenu.processInput(char) function which is used to control this MainMenu's WiffleballScorekeeper instance based on the user's choices.
processInput(char) - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.menu.Menu
This method must be overridden by child classes, and should complete the users selected option.

R

reset() - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Count
Resets the balls and strikes of this count to zero.

Stores a copy of the given game to the stack, using the provided action as the key.

The number of strikes of this count.

T

Team - Class in wiffleballScorekeeper.game
The Count class is used to represent a team in wiffleball.

Team(Team) - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Team

U

undo(HashMap<String, Game>) - Method in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Game
Implementation of an action being undone, by setting this game's attributes using the given game's attributes contained in the HashMap.

W

Static method used for waiting until the user presses enter to continue the execution of the program.
walks - Variable in class wiffleballScorekeeper.game.Team
This team's total number of walks
wiffleballScorekeeper - package wiffleballScorekeeper
This package contains a collection of classes used to produce an implementation of an app that functions as a scorekeeper for a game of wiffleball.
WiffleballScorekeeper - Class in wiffleballScorekeeper
Main class for the Wiffleball Scorekeeper app.
WiffleballScorekeeper() - Constructor for class wiffleballScorekeeper.WiffleballScorekeeper
 
wiffleballScorekeeper.game - package wiffleballScorekeeper.game
This package contains the classes necessary to fully represent a game of wiffleball.
wiffleballScorekeeper.menu - package wiffleballScorekeeper.menu
This package contains the classes used to create all of the menus for the Wiffleball Scorekeeper app.
